  • Uses of Item in items

    Subclasses of Item in items
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AttackBoost
    An item that increases the base attack damage of a Monster by a set amount based on the Rarity of the item.
    class 
    HealthBoost
    An item that increases the base health of a Monster by a set amount based on the Rarity of the item.
    class 
    RandomStatBoost
    An item that increases a random stat of a Monster.
    class 
    RandomTrigger
    An item that gives a Monster a random Trigger for their ability
    class 
    SelectTrigger
    An item that gives a Monster a select Trigger for their ability
    class 
    SpeedBoost
    An item that increases the speed of a Monster by a set amount based on the Rarity of the item.

    Methods in main with parameters of type Item
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Player.addItem(Item newItem)
    Adds an item to the player's inventory If the inventory is full, returns false otherwise true
    boolean
    Player.removeItem(Item removeItem)
    Removes the given item from the player's inventory If the item is not in the inventory, then false is returned
    String
    Player.useItem(Item itemToUse, Monster monsterToEffect)
    Uses item from player inventory on monster
